Notes: 1)UK and European breakdown assistance for account holder(s) in any vehicle whether a driver or passenger, registered in the UK, that they are travelling in. 2)Cover for anyone driving one UK registered vehicle registered to the account holder and which is being used with his/her permission. Where the account is in joint names then up to 2 vehicles can be covered. 3)Assistance provided at home and at the roadside with national recovery and onward travel. 4)No call out limit***5)No excess to pay

FlexGraduate is a migration only account and cannot be applied for. FlexGraduate is an exclusive Current Account for FlexStudent members who will be auto migrated onto this account when they Graduate from their course. When members migrate to FlexGraduate they keep the same account number, PIN and sort code, but they are sent a new FlexGraduate debit card.
PCA.Name: FlexGraduate
